item.title: The public has a right to know
item.dc:creator: @bowserjr2 Bowser jr
item.description:
@bowserjr2 wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:36, topic:298263”][quote author=Cheese_Police link=topic=394667.msg2934043#msg2934043 date=1251445273]
hes banned because hes a fucking moron move on
[/quote]
That’s one way to put it.

It truly isn’t fair to single io9 out in this, I agree he deserved to be punished again, but not banned. He should have been punished according to what he did, there is nothing in the rules about repeat offenders.

Should we really have to close every loophole with regards to rule breaking? We’re running a website, not a country.
That said, however, I do recall our rules page using the word ‘discretion’ and clearly stating that moderators get to exercise it.[/quote]
You have a rule about loophole,the rule of common sense.
Everyones know that if you can’t behave on a forum you are sometime going to be banned.

Read full topic
item.source: The public has a right to know

Yes Mopar Is Cool He Kills ALieums And Doesnt Afraid of ANYtHIBNG

client/java?

In your garden LoLOLolllOLol.

item.description:

Cheese_Police:

hes banned because hes a fucking moron move on

That’s one way to put it.

the bank:

It truly isn’t fair to single io9 out in this, I agree he deserved to be punished again, but not banned. He should have been punished according to what he did, there is nothing in the rules about repeat offenders.

Should we really have to close every loophole with regards to rule breaking? We’re running a website, not a country.
That said, however, I do recall our rules page using the word ‘discretion’ and clearly stating that moderators get to exercise it.

Read full topic

item.title: The public has a right to know
item.dc:creator: @the_bank the bank
item.description:
@the_bank wrote:

[quote=“933pm, post:26, topic:298263”]I’ll choose to ignore that comment…[/quote]Your mother can’t ignore the cock.

[quote=“the fu superior, post:27, topic:298263”][quote author=933pm link=topic=394667.msg2933731#msg2933731 date=1251424015]
I’ll choose to ignore that comment…
[/quote]
But she is a slut.

Anyways.
@thebank : The rules don’t really explain the consequences, so you can’t assume that their course of action here wasn’t just.[/quote]Technically, the rules are basically “moderators can punish as they see fit” however I don’t openly believe that this is at all fair. However, having said that the internet is not a democracy, so in suit neither is this site.

[quote=“Tico, post:29, topic:298263”][quote author=the bank link=topic=394667.msg2933712#msg2933712 date=1251422819]

If you really must know, he was banned for his complete disregard for punishments, spamming, flaming, and trolling. The staff truly had enough of him.

This whole forum is filled with what you mentioned, it’s really not fair to single one person out.
It’s the internet, not real life. Quit caring so much.

When a single person gets annoying enough it becomes fair. Personally I’m new here and don’t know io9 but I know his type.

He doesn’t have a type.

Everyone has a type.
[/quote]For example, your mom is a slut.

It truly isn’t fair to single io9 out in this, I agree he deserved to be punished again, but not banned. He should have been punished according to what he did, there is nothing in the rules about repeat offenders.

The point being, the repetition of io9’s actions were unbearable; he was getting warned 2-3 times a month, which is far to much. A warning meant nothing to him, and a ban was the only alternative for his disregard for punishments.[/quote]I agree with you, but was a permanent ban really necessary? SMF is more than capable of making timed bans.

Read full topic
item.source: The public has a right to know
